participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

bisbas1_y.Description: I usually get very tense when I think something unpleasant is going to happen. | 0 = Not true; 1 = Somewhat true; 2 = True; 3 = Very true

bisbas2_y.Description: I worry about making mistakes. | 0 = Not true; 1 = Somewhat true; 2 = True; 3 = Very true

bisbas3_y.Description: I am hurt when people scold me or tell me that I do something wrong. | 0 = Not true; 1 = Somewhat true; 2 = True; 3 = Very true

bisbas4_y.Description: I feel pretty upset when I think that someone is angry with me. | 0 = Not true; 1 = Somewhat true; 2 = True; 3 = Very true

bisbas5_y.Description: I do not become fearful or nervous, even when something bad happens to me. | 0 = Not true; 1 = Somewhat true; 2 = True; 3 = Very true

bisbas6_y.Description: I feel worried when I have done poorly at something. | 0 = Not true; 1 = Somewhat true; 2 = True; 3 = Very true

bisbas7_y.Description: I am very fearful compared to my friends. | 0 = Not true; 1 = Somewhat true; 2 = True; 3 = Very true

bisbas8_y.Description: I feel excited and full of energy when I get something that I want. | 0 = Not true; 1 = Somewhat true; 2 = True; 3 = Very true

bisbas10_y.Description: I get thrilled when good things happen to me. | 0 = Not true; 1 = Somewhat true; 2 = True; 3 = Very true

bisbas9_y.Description: When I am doing well at something, I like to keep doing this. | 0 = Not true; 1 = Somewhat true; 2 = True; 3 = Very true

bisbas11_y.Description: It would excite me to win a contest. | 0 = Not true; 1 = Somewhat true; 2 = True; 3 = Very true

bisbas12_y.Description: I get really excited when I see an opportunity to get something I like. | 0 = Not true; 1 = Somewhat true; 2 = True; 3 = Very true

bisbas13_y.Description: When I want something, I usually go all the way to get it. | 0 = Not true; 1 = Somewhat true; 2 = True; 3 = Very true

bisbas14_y.Description: I do everything to get the things that I want. | 0 = Not true; 1 = Somewhat true; 2 = True; 3 = Very true

bisbas15_y.Description: When I see an opportunity to get something I want, I go for it right away. | 0 = Not true; 1 = Somewhat true; 2 = True; 3 = Very true

bisbas16_y.Description: Nobody can stop me when I want something. | 0 = Not true; 1 = Somewhat true; 2 = True; 3 = Very true

bisbas17_y.Description: I often do things for no other reason than they might be fun. | 0 = Not true; 1 = Somewhat true; 2 = True; 3 = Very true

bisbas18_y.Description: I crave excitement and new sensations. | 0 = Not true; 1 = Somewhat true; 2 = True; 3 = Very true

bisbas19_y.Description: I am always willing to try something new, when I think it will be fun. | 0 = Not true; 1 = Somewhat true; 2 = True; 3 = Very true

bisbas20_y.Description: I often do things on the spur of the moment. | 0 = Not true; 1 = Somewhat true; 2 = True; 3 = Very true

bisbas5r_y.Description: I do not become fearful or nervous, even when something bad happens to me. | 0=Not true; 1=Somewhat true; 2=True; 3=Very true

bis_y_ss_bis_sum.Description: BIS/BAS: BIS Sum:  bisbas1_y + bisbas2_y + bisbas3_y + bisbas4_y + bisbas5_y + bisbas6_y+ bisbas7_y; Validation: All items must be answered | Carver, C. S. and  White, T. L. (1994) Behavioral inhibition, behavioral activation and affective responses to impending reward and punishment:  the BIS/BAS scales.  Journal of Personality and Social Psychology 67(2): 319-333.

bis_y_ss_bis_sum_nm.Description: BIS/BAS, BIS Sum: Number Missing Answers

bis_y_ss_bis_sum_nt.Description: BIS/BAS, BIS Sum: Number Total Questions

bis_y_ss_bas_rr.Description: BIS/BAS: BAS Reward Responsiveness:  bisbas8_y +  bisbas9_y + bisbas10_y + bisbas11_y + bisbas12_y; Validation: All items must be answered | Carver, C. S. and  White, T. L. (1994) Behavioral inhibition, behavioral activation and affective responses to impending reward and punishment:  the BIS/BAS scales.  Journal of Personality and Social Psychology 67(2): 319-333.

bis_y_ss_bas_rr_nm.Description: BIS/BAS, BAS Reward Responsiveness:  Number Missing Answers

bis_y_ss_bas_rr_nt.Description: BIS/BAS, BAS Reward Responsiveness:  Number Total Questions

bis_y_ss_bas_drive.Description: BIS/BAS: BAS drive:  bisbas13_y +  bisbas14_y + bisbas15_y + bisbas16_y; Validation: All items must be answered | Carver, C. S. and  White, T. L. (1994) Behavioral inhibition, behavioral activation and affective responses to impending reward and punishment:  the BIS/BAS scales.  Journal of Personality and Social Psychology 67(2): 319-333.

bis_y_ss_bas_drive_nm.Description: BIS/BAS, BAS drive:  Number Missing Answers

bis_y_ss_bas_drive_nt.Description: BIS/BAS, BAS drive:  Number Total Questions

bis_y_ss_bas_fs.Description: BIS/BAS: BAS Fun Seeking: bisbas17_y + bisbas18_y + bisbas19_y + bisbas20_y; Validation: All items must be answered | Carver, C. S. and  White, T. L. (1994) Behavioral inhibition, behavioral activation and affective responses to impending reward and punishment:  the BIS/BAS scales.  Journal of Personality and Social Psychology 67(2): 319-333.

bis_y_ss_bas_fs_nm.Description: BIS/BAS, BAS Fun Seeking:  Number Missing Answers

bis_y_ss_bas_fs_nt.Description: BIS/BAS, BAS Fun Seeking:  Number Total Questions

bis_y_ss_bism_sum.Description: BIS/BAS: BIS Sum (modified): bisbas2_y + bisbas3_y + bisbas4_y + bisbas6_y; Validation: All items must be answered | Pagliaccio, D., Luking, K. R., et al. (2016)  Revising the BIS/BAS Scale to study development: Measurement invariance and normative effects of age and sex from childhood through adulthood.  Psychol Assess 28(4): 429-442.

bis_y_ss_bism_sum_nm.Description: BIS/BAS, BIS Sum (modified):  Number Missing Answers

bis_y_ss_bism_sum_nt.Description: BIS/BAS, BIS Sum (modified):  Number Total Questions

bis_y_ss_basm_rr.Description: BIS/BAS: BAS Reward Responsiveness (modified):  bisbas8_y + bisbas9_y + bisbas11_y + bisbas12_y; Validation: All items must be answered | Pagliaccio, D., Luking, K. R., et al. (2016)  Revising the BIS/BAS Scale to study development: Measurement invariance and normative effects of age and sex from childhood through adulthood.  Psychol Assess 28(4): 429-442.

bis_y_ss_basm_rr_nm.Description: BIS/BAS, BAS Reward Responsiveness (modified):  Number Missing Answers

bis_y_ss_basm_rr_nt.Description: BIS/BAS, BAS Reward Responsiveness (modified):  Number Total Questions

bis_y_ss_basm_drive.Description: BIS/BAS: BAS drive (modified): bisbas13_y + bisbas14_y + bisbas15_y + bisbas16_y; Validation: All items must be answered | Carver, C. S. and  White, T. L. (1994) Behavioral inhibition, behavioral activation and affective responses to impending reward and punishment:  the BIS/BAS scales.  Journal of Personality and Social Psychology 67(2): 319-333.

bis_y_ss_basm_drive_nm.Description: BIS/BAS, BAS drive (modified):  Number Missing Answers

bis_y_ss_basm_drive_nt.Description: BIS/BAS, BAS drive (modified):  Number Total Questions
